name: Wisdom4TheBlindRadio
0:
”Alexa, play Wisdom Four The Blind Radio”
”Alexa, start Wisdom Four The Blind Radio”
”Alexa, open Wisdom Four The Blind Radio”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wisdom four the blind radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the official Wisdom Radio Skill, you can hear your favorite radio right now on Alexa! 

Welcome to the new home of Wisdom The Blind Radio. Wisdom 4 The Blind is pleased to announce the launch of Wisdom 4 the Blind RADIO is an informational radio station designed to keep blinded & vision impaired individuals updated on a variety of topics. This information will be available to any, and all blinded individuals Topics will include the following: events, news, Blind Rehab and training, information on tools other groups, and much more.

Support and Developer:
FabioSkill[at]gmx.net
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
